page.title: 07DEPDEN GREEN cont
page.content:
All person living in the parish of Depden have the right to walk on the Green and the village Football team have a pitch. In recent years the Green and the 'right of way' to the Church has been the subject of great controversy between Mr. Rabett and the people of Depden.
ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS Compiled by member of the Chevington Womens Institute, special thanks to: Miss Susan Boor, Mrs. Dorothy Corlett, Mrs. Margaret Bailey, Mrs. Glen Oliver Mr. & Mrs. M.A. Rabett Mr. George Trench for his invaluable help with the land cover record. Chevington School for the use of their computer.
